RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BYATHREAD pressed the early leader from the outside, had a clear lead into the upper stretch and raced well clear later while under steady handling. ETBAUER'S SECRET chased the pace, raced four to five wide around the far turn and finished second best. GEM OF CARLOS hustled from the outside, raced six deep near the three eighths pole, was five wide into the upper stretch, shifted in and moved up late. SABERMAN chased the pace between into the far turn, raced two to three wide in the lane and was empty late. AMAZING AMERICAN stalked the pace early going and weakened while racing three to four wide. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER vied for the early lead along the rail and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Byathread
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside foe, well clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Gem of Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, 6wd 3/8, 5wd upper stretch, shifted in, moved up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since March 4, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGELA'S CELERITY tracked the early leader two wide down the backstretch, had command near the quarter pole and drew off to be well clear under steady pressure. FOR HARPER settled off the early going, moved up four wide near the three sixteenths pole but was no match for the winner late. START WELL dropped back early on, advanced through the far turn while racing four wide near the quarter pole and moved up late while racing from the outside. ANN'S STORM stalked the pace while racing three wide and weakened in the drive. GIRLS COUNT rated under a firm hold early, ridden along nearing the eighths pole and had no response. CHARGED TEMP showed good early speed to set the pace along the inside and gave way. RUN NATALIE RUN raced near the back of the pack early on, saved ground, shifted out through the upper stretch and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Run Natalie Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, shifted out upper stretch, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 4, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 4, 20 23 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AFLEET ASCENT stalked the pace, raced four to five through the upper stretch and prevailed late under strong pressure. GALLANT STAR dropped to the back of the pack early on, raced along the inside down the backstretch around the far turn, angled out through the drive, surged late and just missed. KNOCKALITTLELOUDER tracked the early leader while racing just off the inside, made a two bid near the quarter to challenge for the early, was clear nearing the eighth pole and outkicked late while racing two to three wide. C'MON VE set his own pace under along the inside down the backstretch ad gave way in the drive. COMEDIAN settled early on, raced from the outside in the stretch and lacked a bid. SET HUT was slow early on, raced four wide in the drive and had no response. HONORARIAN raced mid pack early on, saved ground through the far turn and never was a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, inside, angled, surged late, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASH HOLIDAY was slow early, moved up two to three wide around the far turn, angled widest through the stretch run, surged late and got up under strong handling. HEZA SEXY ZONG vied for the early lead near the rail and kept on gamely to the wire. STEAUXLIT settled off the early pace, raced from the outside in the stretch and finished willingly to the wire. SYVESTAR raced mid pack early, raced near the rail in the drive and kept on willing to the wire. MALAKI EMPIRE stalked the pace, raced three to four wide in the lane and was outfinished late. APRIORITY AVENGER chased the pace from the outside, raced three wide around the far turn and weakened through the drive. GRAY DANE settled early on, raced near the around the far turn, angled out through the stretch run and raced evenly late with no closing bid. HAPPY SEASON pressed near the two path and gave way. RUN CARLOS failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Syvestar
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail bid, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Dane
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside, shifted out stretch, even

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 2-3 wide turn, angled widest lane, surged, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 7 1/2F Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,0 00, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST PASSING THRU stalked the pace, made a three wide bid to challenge near the quarter pole and drew off to be clear under strong urging. TEXAS BLUEBONNET stalked the pace, raced near the inside past the quarter pole, shifted out four wide and moved up late to narrowly secure place position. BEAUTIFUL ENDING race mid pack early on, was six wide into the upper stretch and made a good late gain in the drive. BLESSED ANNA pressed the pace from the outside of foe and weakened in the drive. MARY JACK showed good early foot to set the early pace and gave way. TOP TEN DUCHESS hopped at the start, raced three wide near the quarter pole and never threatened. PLATINUM QUEEN dropped back early and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Ending
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 6wd upper stretch, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Top Ten Duchess
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, mid pack, 3wd 1/4, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN THEIR LAST THREE STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 4, 2023 Allowed 5 l bs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WIN YA WIN stalked the pace, moved up three wide near the quarter pole and finished strongly to edge clear under strong handling. DRAFT CHOICE showed good early foot to se the early pace while racing just off the inside, dug in late and finished willingly to the wire. GOLDEN PALACE stalked the early pace, split rivals near the three eighths pole to advance, raced near the rail past the quarter pole and flattened out late. INDIMAAJ raced off the early going, moved up four to five wide around the far turn and had not enough in the drive. MIDNIGHT NIGHTMARE was off a step slow, raced along the inside around the far turn and raced evenly with no closing run. MASTERLY vied for the early lead from the inside and gave way. RECKLESS RANSOM dropped back early, raced five to six wide into the upper stretch and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, inside turn, even

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, split 3/8, inside 1/4, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 5-6wd upper stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Indimaaj
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4-5 wide turn, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE AT A MILE OR OVER ON THE TURF SINCE DECEMBER 4, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHOLELOTTAMO was unhurried early on to race near the back of the pack, angled to race from the outside around the far turn through the stretch, surged late and got up under strong encouragement. CHEAPSKATE DIVA was bumped at the start, pressed the early leader from the outside, dug in and finished gamely to the wire. MISS JANA raced mid pack early, raced near the rail in the stretch run and finished willingly to the wire. WORLD WAR was sent along early to take the early lead, overtaken into the far turn and weakened while racing two to three wide. LUTIE MO broke to the outside, settled mid pack along the inside, angled out and raced evenly late. MONEY WELL SPENT failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Wholelottamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, outside bid, surged late, up, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Money Well Spent
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Jana
ENTRY.OWNER: Arnaud Thomas L and Cassedy Allen

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THROUGH THE CRACKS stalked the early going, moved up from the inside around the far turn and finished well to be well clear under strong handling. SECRET MOMENT showed good early foot to show the pace while racing just off the inside but was no match for the winner in the drive. ABBY DABBY prompt the early pace from the outside and kept on to the wire. MINT JULIUS pressed the early pace between and weakened late. LACEY'S STAR dropped back early, raced five wide into the upper stretch and had no late rally. CABEZA DE TORTUGA was off slowly, raced near the inside and never threatened. NIKLAUSIA dropped back early and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Lacey's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5wd upper stretch, no rally
